1 #include <iostream>
2 #include "utils.h"
3 #include "so3.h"
4 #include "kalmanpredictor.h"
5 #include "kalmancorrector.h"
6 #include "unscentedpredictor.h"
7 #include "unscentedcorrector.h"
8 #include "point3d.h"
9 #include "point3dgps.h"
10 
11 using namespace std;
12 using namespace gcop;
13 using namespace Eigen;
14 
15 typedef KalmanPredictor<Point3dState, 6, 3, Dynamic> Point3dKalmanPredictor;
16 typedef KalmanCorrector<Point3dState, 6, 3, Dynamic, Vector3d, 3> Point3dGpsKalmanCorrector;
17 
18 int main(int argc, char** argv)
19 {
20  Point3d point3d;
21 
22  Point3dGps gps;
23 
24  Point3dKalmanPredictor kp(point3d);
25  Point3dGpsKalmanCorrector kc(point3d, gps);
26 
27  int N = 1000;
28 
29  vector<Point3dState> xts(N); // true states
30  xts[0].v << .1, 0, .2; // true (initially unknown) velocity
31 
32  vector<Point3dState> xs(N); // estimated trajectory
33  xs[0].P.topLeftCorner<3,3>().diagonal().setConstant(.1); // q
34  xs[0].P.bottomRightCorner<3,3>().diagonal().setConstant(.1); // v
35 
36  //The sensor covariance should be provided by gps or change it
37  //If needed later change the name of sensor to vicon
38 
39  double dt = .01;
40 
41  struct timeval timer;
42 
43  for (int i = 0; i < N-1; ++i) {
44  double t = i*dt;
45 
46  // Constant velocity model no acceleration
47  Vector3d u(0, 0, 0); // no inputs
48 
49  // generate true
50  point3d.Step(xts[i+1], t, xts[i], u, dt);
51 
52  Point3dState x;
53 
54  timer_start(timer);
55  kp.Predict(x, t, xs[i], u, dt);
56  long us = timer_us(timer);
57  cout << "Predict took " << us << " us." << endl;
58  cout << "qt: " << xts[i].q.transpose() << endl;
59  cout << "qe: " << x.q.transpose() << endl;
60 
61  // noisy measurements of position
62  Vector3d z = xts[i+1].q + Vector3d(gps.sxy*randn(), gps.sxy*randn(), gps.sz*randn());
63  cout << "z=" << z.transpose() << endl;
64 
65  timer_start(timer);
66  kc.Correct(xs[i+1], t, x, u, z);
67  us = timer_us(timer);
68  cout << "Update took " << us << " us." << endl;
69 
70  cout << "True position: " << xts[i+1].q << endl;
71  cout << "Estim position: " << xs[i+1].q << endl;
72 
73  cout << "True velocity: " << xts[i+1].v << endl;
74  cout << "Estim velocity: " << xs[i+1].v << endl;
75 
76  cout << "P=: " << xs[i+1].P << endl;
77  }
78 }
